structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 44. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Adoption of codes and revisions of ordinances by reference.
